page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: form of heating. Apart from the farmhouses and relatively large modern houses, a few {council houses}can be found at the edge of the area. The houses are pre-second world war ones and would have been built as roadmen's houses who were working on the upkeep of roads at a time when public transport was poor. The council houses found in the area are semi-detached, brick houses with chimneys and uniform gardens. Overall housing is sparse as agricultural land and rough grazing areas cover most of the region.
